example.code: PS C:\> $tag = New-Object Amazon.CodeDeploy.Model.Tag PS C:\> $tag.Key = "Name" PS C:\> $tag.Value = "CodeDeployDemoOPI" PS C:\> Add-CDOnPremiseInstanceTag -InstanceName AssetTag12010298EX -Tag $tag
example.description: This example adds an on-premises instance tag with the specified key and value for the specified on-premises instance.
